```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.height=4, fig.width=10, cache=TRUE , fig.cap="Christchurch map"}
library(leaflet)
library(knitr)


m <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addMarkers(lng=174.006452, lat=-41.288479, popup="Christchurch")  #  -41.288479, 174.006452
m%>% setView(174.006452, -41.288479, zoom = 10) 
m

opts_chunk$set(comment="", fig.align="center", tidy=TRUE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
```
